item.title: Susan add a quote by Betty Smith
item.description: "Look at everything always as though you were seeing it either for the first or last time: Thus is your time on earth filled with glory." -- Betty Smith

item.title: Susan add a quote by Rachel Hauck
item.description: "It must seem like the world is ending, but wait and see what God will do. He must have something wonderful in mind." -- Rachel Hauck

item.title: Susan add a quote by Tony Dungy
item.description: "But when Christ said, “It is finished” and breathed His last breath on the cross, the curtain covering the “Holy of Holies” was immediately torn in half, signifying that we now had—through Christ’s death—direct access to God the Father. It’s still hard to fathom. But the picture of Him standing with open arms waiting for me, rather than being unapproachable behind a curtain, is a welcoming vision." -- Tony Dungy
